content.rendered:
You have come to the right place for all the NCAA Football Week 3 Betting Promos and Free Picks!

New Members can grab FanDuel Bonus Code: Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket

Claim Offer

You can always find NCAA Football Week 3 Betting Promos with Winners and Whiners. This site also has free picks on the side and total for every NCAA Week 3 Football game! Our top experts are locked in for all of Saturday’s top matchups.

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate the best Week 2 College Football Promos

  • BetMGM Bonus Code: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win
  • Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for this week’s College Football and NFL games!
  • Draft Kings Bet $5+ and get $350 in Bonus Bets
  • FanDuel Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket

Week 3 College Football Free Picks:

LSU Tigers at Mississippi State Bulldogs

  • Date: Saturday, Sept.16, 2023
  • Time: Noon PM EST
  • Odds at Caesars Sportsbook LSU -9.5 O/U 54

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert College Football Writer “The Tower” states:

The way these teams match up on paper is a mismatch. It begins with an LSU defense that’s tough against the run facing Mississippi State’s rush-heavy offensive approach. Passing on the Tigers is a much easier task, but the Bulldogs may not have the personnel or playbook to make that happen. Will Rogers can sling it anywhere. What he can’t do is consistently make plays with his legs or get his receivers open.

On the other side, Mississippi State has a suspect secondary. They also got gashed by Arizona’s QB on the ground last week, giving up 44 yards and a score on eight carries. LSU’s Jayden Daniels has dynamic pass catchers to work with along with dangerous mobility. The Tigers shouldn’t have any issues passing the ball all day long. Just like last year, it’ll be a double-digit win for LSU. Geaux for the Tigers against the spread as they continue their revenge tour for the Week 1 loss.

Prediction: LSU -9.5

BetMGM Bonus Code: Get $1,500 in Bonus Bets if your don’t win your opening bet!

Claim Offer

Tennesse Volunteers at Florida Gators

  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: 7:00 PM EST 
  • Odds at at Caesars Sportsbook: Tennesse  -6 O/U 56.5

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert College Handicapper David Delano has thoughts on this one:

 

Bet $50 on any College Football game today and get $250 in Bonus Bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code : WAWMETAGET HERE

 

Colorado State Rams at Colorado Buffaloes

  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 16, 2023
  • Time: 10 PM EST
  • Odds at Caesars Sportsbook: Colorado -23.5 O/U 62.5

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert College Football Writer Adam Rauzino states:

The Colorado State Rams were clobbered by 26 points against Washington State in their lone game of the season. They should be a little better than last season but it’s going to take some time to click. Deion Sanders has his Colorado Buffaloes dominating the headlines. They stunned #17 TCU on the road in a 45-42 win in the opener and pummeled Nebraska by 22 points in their home opener.

Furthermore, Deion’s son, Shedeur has been incredible. The junior QB has accumulated a ridiculous 903 passing yards in two games, and he has done so against power conference opponents. This is bad news for Colorado State who surrendered 466 passing yards in their only game of the season. The Buffaloes defense is below average but Colorado State has an unproven offense. 

Prediction: Colorado Buffaloes -23.5

Draft Kings Bonus Code: Bet $5+ and get $350 in Bonus Bets Instantly

Claim Offer

 

You can also check out the premier picks from some of the industry’s hottest sports handicappers.

Ben Hayes – 7-1-1 CFB Run – CLICK HERE

Mike Lundin – 7-1-1 NFL Run – CLICK HERE

Chris King – 17-5 CFB Run – CLICK HERE

David Hess – 4-0 NFL Primetime Totals- 10-5 CFB Run – CLICK HERE

Mason Folz – 26-9 Best Bet Run 7-2 CFB Run – CLICK HERE

 

Looking for more College Football Promo Codes? Head over to our Sportsbook bonus codes for more offers.

  • Draft Kings Bet $5+ and get $350 in Bonus Bets 
  • FanDuel Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket
  • BetMGM Bonus Code: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win
  • Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for this week’s College Football and NFL games!
